name: Class OctetStreamData
text: A representation of a Data type containing an octet stream.
codes:
public class OctetStreamData
extends Object
implements Data

methods.description: Returns the input stream of this OctetStreamData.

Returns the URI String identifying the data object represented by this
 OctetStreamData.

Returns the MIME type associated with the data object represented by this
 OctetStreamData.
